modName: Athena the Goddess of Wisdom and War
summary: Add a standalone follower inspired by Athena the Goddess of Wisdom and War availabe for CBBE Vanilla, CBBE Curvy, CBBE Curvy HDT, UNP body, UUNP 7base, and UUNP 7baseHDT.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][size=3][size=6]Athena the Goddess of Wisdom and War[/size][/size][size=3]
[/size]
Add a standalone follower inspired by Athena the Goddess of Wisdom and War
availabe for CBBE Vanilla, CBBE Curvy, CBBE Curvy HDT,
UNP body, UUNP 7base, and UUNP 7baseHDT.[size=3]
[/size][/size]
[size=3]Name : Athena
Race: Custom Breton
Body: CBBE and UNP Variant
Voiced: Female Commander

Essensial: False
Marrigable: True
Morality: Any Crime

Class: Warior 2H
Stats: Levels 25 - 150
Extra: 1000 Health and Stamina.
Combat Style: CS Tsun

Outfit: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64215/?]Greek Armor by sirwho[/url]
Inventory:[size=3] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64215/?]Greek Armor by sirwho[/url][/size]
Stats: Daedric Armor
Craftable: False
Upgradeable: [size=3][/size][size=3]False[/size]

Weapon: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15294/?]Nordic Spears by P3dr0 aka Issae[/url]
Stats: Glass Batleaxe
Craftable: [size=3]False[/size]
Upgradeable: [size=3]False[/size]

[size=3][b][b]Location:
[/b][/b][size=3]Whiterun Behind Battleborn's House[/size]

[b]Required :
[/b]Skyrim.esm[b]
[/b]Update.esm[b]
[/b][b]
[/b][b][b]Installation : [/b]
[/b]NMM or copy to data folder[b]

[b]Uninstall : [/b]
[/b]Remove from NMM or Delete from data folder[b]
[size=3][size=3][b]
